# Background

<br>

##  Experience

**since 2019 \| Data Scientist \@ Helsana insurance group**\
Lead, design and implementation of data analyses for internal projects and scientific studies at the health science department, with a focus on understanding the effectiveness and the quality of treatment in the Swiss health care system. See our publications [here]('https://www.helsana.ch/de/helsana-gruppe/medien-publikationen/wissenschaftliche-publikationen.html').

**2017 - 2019 \| Data Scientist \@ Sanitas insurance group**\
Lead, design and implementation of advanced analytical projects. In-house consulting and teaching of statistical and analytical skills.

**2012 - 2016 \| projectwise \| Biostatistican \@ University Hospital Zurich, Cantonal Hospital Aarau**\
Design, implementation of and consulting on statistics and data analyses for clinical trials/ scientific publications.

<hr>

## Education

**2017 \| PhD in Evolutionary Biology**\
Anthropological Institute and Museum, University of Zurich. Comparative analysis on social & ecological factors driving brain size evolution.

**2015 \| Master of Science in Biostatistics**\
Epidemiology, Biostatistics and Prevention Institute, University of Zurich.

**2012 \| Master of Science in Anthropology**\
Anthropological Institute and Museum, University of Zurich.
